DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim test effectiveness self-help DM intervention ( SHIP-DM ) , comprehensive , culturally tailor DM management intervention , improve glucose outcome ; To determine effectiveness SHIP-DM KAI type 2 DM improve self-care skill psycho-behavioral outcome related DM control , develop tangible infrastructure dissemination valid effective education material wider population KAI type 2 DM US ( e.g. , audio-visual education material , web-based intervention material , mobile telephone-based intervention material ) explore feasibility acceptability dissemination module , utilize delay intervention group participant . The secondary aim obtain preliminary cost-effectiveness data relate propose intervention , include cost estimate type DM intervention , establish systematic , long-term dissemination plan , include document effective methodology , facilitate fast translation research finding product direct consumer non-research setting .
DOC.brief_title: Community-Based Diabetes Care Korean American Immigrants
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Self-identified first generation Korean American 2 . Type 2 diabetes 3 . Age 30-75 year 4 . Resides Washington-Baltimore area 5 . Self-identified DM HbA1c > = 7.0 % within 6 month screen 6 . Expresses willingness participate aspect study full course Exclusion criteria 1 . Unable give inform consent 2 . Physical mental health condition could limit active participation study ( e.g. , blindness eye , severe immobility , psychiatric disease ) 3 . Hematological condition would affect A1C assay , e.g. , hemolytic anemia , sickle cell anemia 4 . Past experience diabetes group education
